   (vi) OAU accepts   
a) ND upper credit in Food Science and Technology.  
b) ND/HND upper credit plus five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes.  
(vii) WESLEYUNI  accepts   
a) at least 2 A’ level passes in Chemistry, Agricultural 
Science or Biology, Physics or Home Economics.   
b) NCE merit/credit and ND upper credit in addition 
to five (5) ‘O' level credit passes or equivalents.  
  
UTME  
(i) BELLS requires five (5) ‘O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology, Physics/ 
Agricultural Science/ Geography or Economics/ Food 
and Nutrition. May consider ‘O’ level  pass in Physics.  
(ii) FUTO requires Biology as the fifth (5th) subject.  
(iii) IBADAN - As in Agricultural and Environmental 
Engineering.  
(iv) LAUTECH accepts Agricultural Science in lieu of 
Biology.  
(v) OAU does not accept Biology in lieu of Physics.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) BELLS accepts physics/mathematics. (ii) 
FUTO does not accept Biology.  
(iii) IBADAN does not accept Biology  
(iv) LAUTECH requires Physics  
INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION 
ENGINEERING:

OSUSTECH    
UNIZIK

Mathematics and 
Physics.

include Mathematics,

Language and any other  
Science subject.
